Data Fields
uart_dma_tx_qe Struct Reference
mcu » apollo330P » UART Stream Functionality

Detailed Description

defines a tx buffer descriptor used for DMA transmissions in the streaming functions The DMA does not require an aligned start address This is part of the stream state

#include <am_hal_uart_stream.h>

Data Fields

struct uart_dma_tx_qe * nextDesc
 
uint32_t ui32BuffBaseAddr
 used in double buffer mode to save base address
 
uint32_t ui32StartAddress
 next starting address of this section
 
uint32_t ui32BufferSize
 the size of this descriptor buffer
 
uint32_t ui32NumBytes
 num bytes saved in this section, other than sending DMA
 
uint32_t ui32NumDmaQueued
 number of bytes in buffer, sending via DMA
 
uint8_t descIdx
 
uint8_t align [3]
